diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Sarcoidosis involving the heart and thoracic and inguinal lymph nodes
diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Cardiac amyloidosis, POEMS syndrome, Castleman's disease, primary lung cancer, lymphoma, sarcoma, thymoma, and germ-cell tumors
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with signs of heart failure and profound lymphadenopathy which suggested an underlying systemic disease. Cardiac echocardiography revealed hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy, and imaging suggested pulmonary hypertension and significant lymphadenopathy. Biopsy revealed noncaseating granulomas, confirming sarcoidosis as the underlying condition.
